title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When I preview and click the 'Show Report Parameters' button, I expect to see the default values shown in the value box for each parameter so that I can easily modify the parameter I want to change. However, in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, all the values are empty. This is inconvenient because I only wanted to modify one parameter but now I have to input all the values.
EB: Preview and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button should display the default values of the report parameters in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, allowing me to modify only the necessary parameter.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create several report parameters with default values. 2. Drag the report parameters to the layout. 3. Preview the report and click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
